snippet: Yum Brands’ fourth-quarter profit fell 5 percent because of one-time costs, but its adjusted results beat expectations.
abstract: Yum Brands reports fourth-quarter profit of $321 million, or 70 cents a share, down 5 percent from $337 million, or 72 cents a share, in year-ago quarter; revenue rose 1 percent to $4.18 billion.
lead_paragraph: Yum Brands’ fourth-quarter profit fell 5 percent because of one-time costs, but its adjusted results beat expectations.

headline.main: Profit at Yum Brands Tops Analyst Forecasts
headline.print_headline: Profit at Yum Brands Tops Analyst Forecasts
